headline.main: The Doctor's World; The Doctor's World

docs.abstract: Dr Lawrence K Altman article on company doctors and occupational medicine specialists; sees scarcity of such doctors as threat to efforts to reduce health hazards in workplace; drawing (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: COMPANY DOCTORS and occupational medicine specialists, who have made major contributions to public health, are in short supply, and their scarcity threatens to curtail further reductions in health hazards in the workplace.
docs.snippet: COMPANY DOCTORS and occupational medicine specialists,  who have made major contributions to public health, are in short supply, and their scarcity threatens to curtail further reductions in health hazards in the workplace.
